00019 #ifndef _XENOMAI_ALCHEMY_EVENT_H
00020 #define _XENOMAI_ALCHEMY_EVENT_H
00021 
00022 #include <stdint.h>
00023 #include <alchemy/timer.h>
00024 
00025 /* Creation flags. */
00026 #define EV_PRIO  0x1    /* Pend by task priority order. */
00027 #define EV_FIFO  0x0    /* Pend by FIFO order. */
00028 
00029 /* Operation flags. */
00030 #define EV_ANY  0x1     /* Disjunctive wait. */
00031 #define EV_ALL  0x0     /* Conjunctive wait. */
00032 
00033 struct RT_EVENT {
00034         uintptr_t handle;
00035 };
00036 
00037 typedef struct RT_EVENT RT_EVENT;
00038 
00039 struct RT_EVENT_INFO {
00040         unsigned long value;
00041         int nwaiters;
00042         char name[32];
00043 };
00044 
00045 typedef struct RT_EVENT_INFO RT_EVENT_INFO;
00046 
00047 #ifdef __cplusplus
00048 extern "C" {
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 int rt_event_create(RT_EVENT *event,
00052                     const char *name,
00053                     unsigned long ivalue,
00054                     int mode);
00055 
00056 int rt_event_delete(RT_EVENT *event);
00057 
00058 int rt_event_signal(RT_EVENT *event,
00059                     unsigned long mask);
00060 
00061 int rt_event_wait_timed(RT_EVENT *event,
00062                         unsigned long mask,
00063                         unsigned long *mask_r,
00064                         int mode,
00065                         const struct timespec *abs_timeout);
00066 static inline
00067 int rt_event_wait_until(RT_EVENT *event,
00068                         unsigned long mask, unsigned long *mask_r,
00069                         int mode, RTIME timeout)
00070 {
00071         struct timespec ts;
00072         return rt_event_wait_timed(event, mask, mask_r, mode,
00073                                    alchemy_abs_timeout(timeout, &ts));
00074 }
00075 
00076 static inline
00077 int rt_event_wait(RT_EVENT *event,
00078                   unsigned long mask, unsigned long *mask_r,
00079                   int mode, RTIME timeout)
00080 {
00081         struct timespec ts;
00082         return rt_event_wait_timed(event, mask, mask_r, mode,
00083                                    alchemy_rel_timeout(timeout, &ts));
00084 }
00085 
00086 int rt_event_clear(RT_EVENT *event,
00087                    unsigned long mask,
00088                    unsigned long *mask_r);
00089 
00090 int rt_event_inquire(RT_EVENT *event,
00091                      RT_EVENT_INFO *info);
00092 
00093 int rt_event_bind(RT_EVENT *event,
00094                   const char *name, RTIME timeout);
00095 
00096 int rt_event_unbind(RT_EVENT *event);
00097 
00098 #ifdef __cplusplus
00099 }
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 #endif /* _XENOMAI_ALCHEMY_EVENT_H */
